snippet.title: Ravenswatch | Avalon Teaser - Nacon Connect 2024
snippet.description:
Play Ravenswatch Early Access now: http://nacon.me/Ravenswatch

Behold, gaze upon the announcement of our next Major Update: the third chapter of Ravenswatch, now known as Avalon.

Avalon shall be bestowed upon thee come April of the year 2024.

Ravenswatch will be available in 2024 on PC, PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch™

Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/PlayRavenswatch

-------------------------------
For news about our other games and products, you can also follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/NaconGaming 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/NaconGaming 
Twitter ► https://twitter.com/Nacon
